Text: ENJOY ENJOY Wargame Airland Battle 2013 New PC Game by RELOADED Old School!

I'm suspicious about any game that can't translate its title better than this...

It's the "Super happy smile family fun wish time RTS!!!!"

Actually as pointed out in another torrent

To change the language from German to English :
Open the steam_rld file ,which is in the directory were Wargane Airland Battle is installed ,with notepad.
Change the last line is the file ,which reads Language=german to Language=english.
Now the game is in English. 


Tested and works.

Microsoft Security Essentials was going crazy about a "Virtool:Win32/Obfuscator.XZ". I practically had to disable my anti-virus because it kept putting the steam api crack file into quarantine. 

Never had a problem with RELOADED torrents so I'm assuming it's not malicious but it's still annoying.

Hey guys.I have the problem with MSVCP110.dll that is missing from my computer.!!I found the dll and like the instractions said i download it and i put it incide the installation game folder and in C:WindowsSysWOW64 and i reboot my pc.That did not fix the problem and it still it give me the same error.And i instaled the vcredist_x64 but it did not fix the error to.Btw i have Win 7x64.So any help or solution about my problem it would be much apreciated guys.!Thanks in advance.

found a solution that works for the missing msvcp110.dll : at the end of the setup check the 3 boxes and install all 3 ( 2 of them are microsoft visuals c++ thay u will need ) wich will give you the missing .dll file .
